00037 Entree& Analyse_Angle::readOn(Entree& is )

00045 
00046 #include <Linear_algebra_tools_impl.h>
00047 
00048 double largest_angle(const DoubleTab& coords)
00049 {
00050   if (((coords.dimension(0)!=4)&&(coords.dimension(0)!=3))||(coords.dimension(1)!=3))
00051     {
00052       Cerr<<" case not provided"<<finl;
00053       Process::exit();
00054     }
00055   int nb_face=coords.dimension(0);
00056   Vecteur3 normals[4];
00057   Vecteur3 edge[2],opp;
00058   edge[1].set(0,0,1);
00059   for (int n=0; n<nb_face; n++)
00060     {
00061 
00062       int prem=0;
00063       if (n==0) prem=1;
00064       int compteur=0;
00065       for (int s=0; s<nb_face; s++)
00066         {
00067           if ((s!=n) && (s!=prem))
00068             {
00069               edge[compteur].set(coords(s,0)-coords(prem,0),
00070                                  coords(s,1)-coords(prem,1),
00071                                  coords(s,2)-coords(prem,2));
00072               compteur++;
00073             }
00074         }
00075       if (compteur!=nb_face-2) abort();
00076       opp.set(coords(n,0)-coords(prem,0),
00077               coords(n,1)-coords(prem,1),
00078               coords(n,2)-coords(prem,2));
00079       Vecteur3::produit_vectoriel(edge[0],edge[1],normals[n]);
00080 // normals[n]=edge[0]*edge[1];
00081       double l = normals[n].length();
00082       normals[n]*=(l>0 ? 1./l : 0);
00083       if (Vecteur3::produit_scalaire(normals[n],opp)<0)
00084         normals[n]*=-1;
00085     }
00086 // on a les 4 normals orientes vers l'interieur
00087   double max_pscal=-100;
00088   for (int n1=0; n1<nb_face; n1++)
00089     for (int n2=n1+1; n2<nb_face; n2++)
00090       {
00091         double pscal=Vecteur3::produit_scalaire(normals[n1],normals[n2]);
00092 // min_pscal=pscal;
00093         if (pscal>max_pscal)
00094           max_pscal=pscal;
00095       }
00096   double tet=acos(max_pscal<=1. ? max_pscal : 1.)/acos(-1.)*180; //!< acos(-1) ne compile pas avec xlC
00097 
00098   tet=180-tet;
00099   return tet;
00100 }
00101 
00102 Entree& Analyse_Angle::interpreter(Entree& is)
00103 {
00104   int nb_histo;
00105   Nom nom_dom;
00106   is >> nom_dom;
00107   is >> nb_histo;
00108   Domaine& dom=ref_cast(Domaine,objet(nom_dom));
00109 
00110   histogramme_angle(dom,Cout,nb_histo);
00111   return is;
00112 }
00113 void histogramme_angle(const Domaine& dom , Sortie& out,  int nb_histo )
00114 {
00115   out<<finl<<"Histogram of the largest angle of each element found into the mesh "<<dom.le_nom()<<" :" << finl;
00116   Motcle type_elem(dom.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je());
00117   if (((type_elem!="triangle")&& (type_elem!="tetraedre")) || ((type_elem=="triangle") && (Domaine::dimension==3)))
00118     {
00119       out<<"Not available for "<<type_elem<<" in dimension "<<Domaine::dimension<<finl;
00120       return;
00121     }
00122 
00123   ArrOfInt histo(nb_histo+1);
00124   int nb_elem=dom.zone(0).nb_elem();
00125   const DoubleTab& som=dom.les_sommets();
00126   const IntTab& les_elems=dom.zone(0).les_elems();
00127   int dim_space=som.dimension(1);
00128   int nb_som_elem=les_elems.dimension(1);
00129   DoubleTab coords(nb_som_elem,3);
00130   for (int elem=0; elem<nb_elem; elem++)
00131     {
00132       for (int s=0; s<nb_som_elem; s++)
00133         {
00134           int sommet=les_elems(elem,s);
00135           for (int dir=0; dir<dim_space; dir++)
00136             coords(s,dir)=som(sommet,dir);
00137 
00138         }
00139       double teta=largest_angle(coords);
00140 
00141       int test=(int)(teta/180*nb_histo);
00142       histo(test)++;
00143       if (test==nb_histo)
00144         Cerr << "Error, the mesh cell " << elem << " is flat. Fix your mesh." << finl;
00145     }
00146   if (histo(nb_histo)>0)
00147     Process::exit();
00148   int nb_elem_tot=(int)Process::mp_sum(nb_elem);
00149   if (nb_elem_tot>0)
00150     {
00151       double obtuse_cells_proportion=0;
00152       for (int h=0; h<nb_histo; h++)
00153         {
00154           histo(h)=Process::mp_sum(histo(h));
00155 // Pas d'angles en dessous de 60 forcement
00156           if (180/nb_histo*h>=60)
00157             {
00158               obtuse_cells_proportion=histo(h)*100./nb_elem_tot;
00159               int angle=180/nb_histo*h;
00160               out <<"Between "<<angle<<" degrees and " << 180/nb_histo*(h+1)<<" degrees : "<<histo(h)<<" elements ( "<<obtuse_cells_proportion<< " %)"<<finl;
00161             }
00162         }
00163 // Criteria used on the last bin (170-180 degrees)
00164       if (obtuse_cells_proportion>20)
00165         {
00166           Cerr << finl;
00167           Cerr << "Warning:" << finl;
00168           Cerr << "Your mesh has too much obtuse cells for a TRUST calculation." << finl;
00169           Cerr << "Check the mesh requirements." << finl;
00170 // Process::exit();
00171         }
00172     }
00173   out << finl;
00174 }
